input_text:
Job Title: IT Project Manager - Healthcare (Hybrid In NYC 2x Per Week)

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Job Summary (Description) 

The Sr. IT Project Manager manages, plans, tracks and coordinates the delivery of projects at our client that involve IT related activity. This role ensures goals and objectives of enterprise-wide projects are achieved within a prescribed timeframe and funding parameters. Manages all aspects of a project, establishes timelines and ensures project deadlines are met.

 Responsibilities 

The Sr. IT Project Manager is to be well versed in project management, a trusted partner able to align teams to drive, execute and deliver. The role will manage multiple initiatives partnering with multiple project teams across the groups. Responsibilities include, but are not limited to:

 Working with stakeholders to define and agree on project scope and requirements Work with the project team to create and manage project plans, milestone timelines, identify risks and provide clear communication Interfacing with all roles across different groups to always ensure transparency and alignment of a project Managing the execution of work, which includes tracking team progress, routing deliverables for review and approval and monitoring scope Actively monitoring project risks/issues, escalate in a timely manner, and drive teams to effective solutions Being able to hold your own in a team conversation, as well as with technical leaders outside of the team Having a working understanding of both business and technical discussions and the ability to contribute to either Proactively identifies recommendations to make the solution better


 Qualifications 

 Minimum of 12+ years of project management experience Extensive technical experience in all IT areas Excellent leadership skills Flexibility and forward-thinking approach to the way work is done Ability to work on multiple projects while prioritizing and meeting deadlines Outstanding attention to detail and strong analytical and interpersonal skills Excellent communication skills and the ability to interact across all leverls in a confident and professional manner Solid understanding of project management methodology, including the ability to identify and resolve issues, manage risk, and develop detailed work plans Experience interfacing with partner vendors on technical delivery projects Licenses and Certifications: Project Management Professional, PMP (preferred), Scaled Agile Framework (preferred)


 About TEKsystems 

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.

The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: IT Project Manager - Healthcare
output_json.summary: Sr. IT Project Manager managing, planning, tracking, and coordinating the delivery of IT-related projects.
job_responsibilities: Working with stakeholders to define and agree on project scope and requirements
Creating and managing project plans, milestone timelines
Identifying risks and providing clear communication
Interfacing with all roles across different groups to ensure transparency and alignment
Managing the execution of work, tracking team progress
Routing deliverables for review and approval
Monitoring scope and actively managing project risks/issues
Holding conversations with technical leaders outside the team
Having a working understanding of both business and technical discussions
Proactively identifying recommendations to improve the solution

As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, they help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity.
